title: Table of values of derivative, no context part - d

content.question: Suppose f'(5)=3 and f''(x)<0 for all x in the closed interval 5 ≤ x ≤ 8. Use the line tangent to the graph of f at x=5 to show that f(7) ≤ 4. Use the secant line for the graph of f on 5 ≤ x ≤ 8 to show that f(7)≥4/3 .

frqParts.text: Suppose f'(5)=3 and f''(x)<0 for all x in the closed interval 5 ≤ x ≤ 8. Use the line tangent to the graph of f at x=5 to show that f(7) ≤ 4. Use the secant line for the graph of f on 5 ≤ x ≤ 8 to show that f(7)≥4/3 .

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
